content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), connected to multiple pipes and small electric poles at positions (x=3.5, y=0.5) and (x=7.5, y=-0.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5), connected to multiple pipes

### Furnace group at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0 to y=-80.0)
Consists of multiple furnaces at positions (x=52.0, y=-84.0), (x=52.0, y=-82.0), and (x=52.0, y=-80.0)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with unknown position and status

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities to be connected are compatible and have available connection points
- Check that the entities are not already connected to other entities in a way that prevents the desired connection
- Verify that the positions of the entities are correct and that they are not too far apart to be connected

### Errors when using pipes
- Make sure that the pipes are properly connected to entities and that the fluid system is working correctly
- Check that the pipes are not blocked or obstructed by other entities or terrain features

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump is properly connected to pipes and that the fluid system is working correctly
- Check that the offshore pump is not blocked or obstructed by other entities or terrain features

### Errors when using furnaces
- Make sure that the furnaces have the necessary fuel and ingredients to operate
- Check that the furnaces are properly connected to other entities and that the fluid system is working correctly

### Errors when using labs
- Ensure that the lab has the necessary power and resources to operate
- Check that the lab is properly connected to other entities and that the research is set up correctly

### Errors when using electricity
- Make sure that the electricity generator is properly connected to the power network
- Check that the electricity generator has the necessary fuel and resources to operate
- Verify that the small electric poles are properly connected to the electricity generator and that the voltage is correct
